SCTX:
Begin GlenmorilWitchAltar

 
short greetonce
short nolore
float timer
 

if ( greetonce == -1 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_WolfGiver" <= 10 )
		Disable
	endif
endif


if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_WolfGiver" >= 30 )
	Disable
endif


if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_WolfGiver" >= 20 )	
		set timer to ( timer + getsecondspassed )
			if (timer > .75 )
				if ( greetonce == 0 )
				ForceGreeting
				set greetonce to -1
			endif
		endif		 
	endif
endif
return
 


End GlenmorilWitchAltar
